page.title: 17Sport in the East End
page.content: Christopher Driscoll, Age 13: Football is very popular. There are 2 professional teams in the area: West Ham in the First Division and Orient in the Fourth. Paul Miller of Spurs and and Les Sealy of Luton were born in Bethnal Green. Scouts from big clubs come to our school to watch boys play; our team is very good with a history of cups and championships. Martin Kelly, Age 14: Charlie Magri is our World Flyweight Champion. He was born on July 20th 1956, had 140 fights as an amateur, turned professional in 1978 and became champion in 1983 beating Eloncio Mercedes in Round 7. Managed by Terry Lawless and trained by Frank Black, Charlie has George Wiggs as 'Corner Man' to deal with cuts. His aim is to box for another year then run his shop at 345 Bethnal Green Road.
